definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: What time shall I set the alarm (clock) for?
sentences.chinese: 我该把闹钟拨到几点钟响？

sentences.english: Here are some things to consider so that your days are loaded with accomplishments.
sentences.chinese: 为了你的每一天都饱有成就，你需要考虑的以下几点。

sentences.english: The following points are considered in evaluating the maturity of the integration layer.
sentences.chinese: 评估集成层的成熟度时应考虑以下几点。

sentences.english: WANT to set down some general remarks about tramps .
sentences.chinese: 就流浪汉问题，我想谈几点粗略的看法。

sentences.english: The article discusses several requests on the style and charcter of worsted goods.
sentences.chinese: 本文简述了毛织物的风格及特征的几点基本要求。

sentences.english: The proposal has been made to improve cooling table.
sentences.chinese: 提出了冷床改进的几点建议。

sentences.english: At last, suggestions for improving the makeup reliability of PSC connection are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 对关于提高PSC接头上扣可靠性问题提出几点建议。

sentences.english: The several opinions on opening up the LNG market in Southeast Fujian are proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中还对如何开拓闽东南LNG市场提出几点看法。

sentences.english: The paper gives several suggestions in the end.
sentences.chinese: 文章最后对上述问题提出了怍者的几点建议。

sentences.english: What time do you finish working every day?
sentences.chinese: 你每天几点钟结束工作？

sentences.english: At last, several suggestions for the research and development of polarizer are presented.
sentences.chinese: 对偏光片的研究与产业发展提出了几点建议。

sentences.english: This artcle dicusses several promotion strategies on the present commercial sports fitness club marketing aspects.
sentences.chinese: 就目前商业体育健身俱乐部营销方面谈几点促销技巧。

sentences.english: To achieve these, a leader needs communication as a main tool.
sentences.chinese: 一个领袖需要善用沟通作为工具来达到以上几点。

sentences.english: In view of the above, this text proposes some countermeasures to realize conformity of the city function in the capital-circle.
sentences.chinese: 据此提出促进首都圈内各城市职能整合的几点对策。

sentences.english: In many regions, stores can now open or close whenever they want.
sentences.chinese: 现在，许多地区的店铺都可以想开到几点就开到几点。

sentences.english: In many regions, stores can now open or close whenever they want.
sentences.chinese: 现在，许多地区的店铺都可以想开到几点就开到几点。

definition: that level or lower/that amount or less/the following
Diandian (Chinese microblogging and social networking website)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
